items: Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and your toes pointing forward.
Hold a chair in front of you with both hands, keeping your arms straight.
Slowly lower your body down into a squat position, keeping your back straight and your knees behind your toes.
Pause for a moment at the bottom of the squat, then slowly rise back up to the starting position.
Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.
Strengthens the lower body muscles, including the quadriceps, hamstrings, and glutes
Targets the core muscles, including the abdominals and lower back
Can be modified for different fitness levels and abilities
Allows for proper form and technique with the assistance of the Smith machine
